concept.title: Visits
concept.shortdesc: Analytics counts a visit each time a server call occurs with a Visit Page Number equal to 1.

conbody.p: If you look at the previous table, this occurred 4 times: at hits 1, 9, 10, and 11. Similar to visitors, this value returns to normal after the initial association because the Visit Page Number is not reset back to 1 due to a change in the effective visitor ID.
